TrainingDataSets¶

class ucf.TrainingDataSets(features_and_targets_data_set)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for generating training, validation, and testing data sets.

original_data¶

Original features and targets.

Type

pd.DataFrame

indices_of_features¶

Numeric indication of position of features in original_data

Type

list

indices_of_targets¶

Numeric indication of position of targets in original_data

Type

list

train_features¶

Unscaled training features.

Type

np.array

train_targets¶

Training targets. Shuffled if desired.

Type

np.array

validation_features¶

Validation features

Type

np.array

validation_targets¶

Validation Targets

Type

np.array

test_features¶

Testing features

Type

np.array

test_targets¶

Testing targets

Type

np.array

scaled_train_features¶

Train features scaled to mean zero and unit variance. Shuffled if desired.

Type

np.array

scaled_validation_features¶

Validation features scaled to mean zero and unit variance.

Type

Numpy Array

scaled_test_features¶

Test features scaled to mean zero and unit variance.

Type

Numpy Array

Methods Summary

compute_mean_and_standard_deviation()

Computation of mean and standard deviation of features in the training data set.

get_scaled_features()

Convenience method to return scaled features.

get_targets()

Convenience method to return targets features.

make_training_data(train_size, validation_size)

Make features and targets

scale_features()

Standardize features in such manner that their mean is centered to zero, and unit of measurement is set to variance.

shuffle()

Shuffle the scaled training features and targets.

Methods Documentation

compute_mean_and_standard_deviation()[source]¶

Computation of mean and standard deviation of features in the training data set.

Returns

No explicit return.

Return type

None

Notes

Values are stored in the 'features_mean' and 'features_standard_deviation' attribute of the class.

get_scaled_features()[source]¶

Convenience method to return scaled features.

Returns

  • scaled_train_features (np.array) -- Scaled features for training.

  • scaled_validation_features (np.array) -- Scaled features for validation.

  • scaled_test_features (np.array) -- Scaled features for testing.

get_targets()[source]¶

Convenience method to return targets features.

Returns

  • train_targets (np.array) -- Targets for training.

  • validation_targets (np.array) -- Targets for validation.

  • test_targets (np.array) -- Targets for testing.

make_training_data(train_size, validation_size)[source]¶

Make features and targets

Parameters

  • train_size (int) -- Proportion of the training set.

  • validation_size (int) -- Proportion of the validation set.

Notes

Size of the testing set is determined implicitly.

scale_features()[source]¶

Standardize features in such manner that their mean is centered to zero, and unit of measurement is set to variance.

Returns

Standardized features are placed inside appropriate attributes of the class.

Return type

Numpy Array

shuffle()[source]¶

Shuffle the scaled training features and targets.

Only scaled training features and targets are shuffled. Validation, and test data sets are not shuffled.
